lead_paragraph: Omar Khadr was sentenced to 40 years in custody for war crimes, but he might be released in fewer than three years, the Defense Department said.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Omar Khadr was sentenced to 40 years in custody for war crimes, but he might be released in fewer than three years, the Defense Department said.

headline.main: Child Soldier for Al Qaeda Is Sentenced for War Crimes
headline.seo: Omar Khadr, Al Qaeda Child Soldier, Sentenced for War Crimes
headline.print_headline: Child Soldier For Al Qaeda Is Sentenced For War Crimes

byline.contributor: Ian Austen contributed reporting from Ottawa.
